A launcher icon is a graphic that repres: Ikon peluncur adalah sebuah grafis yang merepresentasikan aplikasi anda. Ikon peluncur muncul di peluncur aplikasi dan di dok pengguna. Ikon peluncur dapat muncul di tempat lain di OS, seperti pada notifikasi atau ketika menjadi rujukan aplikasi lain.
You should create separate icons for all: Anda harus membuat ikon dengan berbagai kemungkinan ukuran, termasuk 32, 48, 64, dan 128 piksel. Hal ini memastikan ikon anda akan ditampilkan dengan baik di seluruh OS tanpa menjadi kabur atau aneh.
App launcher icons have three primary go: Ikon peluncur aplikasi memiliki 3 tujuan utama:
Promote the brand and tell the story of: Mempromosikan merek dan menceritakan sejarah aplikasi.
Help users discover the app in the softw: Membantu pengguna menemukan aplikasi di dalam pusat perangkat lunak.
App launcher icons are an opportunity to: Ikon peluncur aplikasi adalah kesempatan untuk memamerkan merek dan memberi petunjuk dari cerita tentang aplikasi anda. Jadi, anda harus:
Create an icon that is unique and memora: Membuat ikon yang unik dan mengesankan.
Use a color scheme that suits your brand: Menggunakan skema warna yang cocok dengan merek anda.
Don't try to communicate too much with t: Jangan coba berkomunikasi terlalu banyak melalui ikon. Ikon yang sederhana akan memberi dampak dan kesan yang lebih.
Avoid including the application name in: Hindari menyertakan nama aplikasi pada ikon.
Help users discover the app in the softw: Membantu pengguna menemukan aplikasi di dalam pusat perangkat lunak.
App launcher icons are the first look th: App launcher icons are the first look that prospective users will get of your app in the software center. A high quality app icon can influence users to find out more as they scroll through lists of apps.
Quality matters here; a well-designed ic: Quality matters here; a well-designed icon can be a strong signal that your app is of similarly high quality. Consider working with an icon designer to develop the app’s launcher icon.
A successful app launcher icon will look: A successful app launcher icon will look great in all situations: on near-white when in the the app launcher, partially over any background when on the dock, and next to any other icons and app widgets. To do this, icons should:
Work on a wide variety of backgrounds.
Reflect the implied lighting model of th: Reflect the implied lighting model of the OS (top-lit).
Have a unique silhouette for faster reco: Have a unique silhouette for faster recognition; not all app icons should be square.
Not present a cropped view of a larger i: Not present a cropped view of a larger image.
Have similar weight to other icons. Icon: Have similar weight to other icons. Icons that are too spindly or that don't use enough of the space may not successfully attract the user’s attention, or may not stand out well on all backgrounds.
Below are some &quot;do and don't&quot;: Below are some "do and don't" examples to consider when creating icons for your app.
Icons should not be overly complicated. Remember that launcher icons will be used at often small sizes, so they should be distinguishable at small sizes.
Icons should not be cropped. Use unique: Icons should not be cropped. Use unique shapes where appropriate; remember that launcher icons should differentiate your app from others. Additionally, do not use a glossy finish unless the represented object has a glossy material.
Icons should not be thin. They should ha: Icons should not be thin. They should have a similar weight to other icons. Overly thin icons will not stand out well on all backgrounds.
Icons should make use of the alpha chann: Icons should make use of the alpha channel, and should not simply be full-frame images. Where appropriate, distinguish your icon with subtle yet appealing visual treatment.
If your icon has a tilt to it's perspect: If your icon has a tilt to it's perspective, it should tilt backward (not forward).
Launcher icons should be 32-bit PNGs or: Ikon peluncur harus PNG 32-bit atau SVG dengan saluran alpha untuk transparansi. Anda harus menyediakan versi 32, 48, 64, dan 128 piksel dari ikon peluncur anda untuk memastikan ikon ditampilkan dengan baik di seluruh OS.
You should also include a few pixels of: You should also include a few pixels of padding in launcher icons to maintain a consistent visual weight with adjacent icons. This padding can also be used to make room for a subtle drop shadow, which can help ensure that launcher icons are legible across on any background color.
